mainText:
I'm so sad more than I could ever say..
Although my English is not good please receive my deeply meaning. I'm IPhone user and I'm very proud of Jobs. You make not only me new world and convenience life but also all over the people. Actually, I was hoping to get better your healthy but...........

With all due respect.. Jobs!
I remember you. We remember you. I'll pray where you there in heaven. Good bye, bye Steve Jobs!
author: Sunghye
